meanings.definition: superlative form of 'luxe', meaning luxurious or elegant
meanings.sent1: The grand ballroom was the luxest venue in town.
meanings.sent2: She wore the luxest gown to the gala.
meanings.sent3: Even the pigeons seemed to admire the luxest chandelier.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the luxest accessory she wore.
meanings.sent5: The luxest hotel in the city had a breathtaking view of the skyline.

meanings.definition: superlative form of 'lux', meaning to enjoy luxury or extravagance
meanings.sent1: They luxest in the spa treatments during their vacation.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, she luxest in a bubble bath.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to luxest in the warm sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: He would luxest in the comfort of his favorite armchair.
meanings.sent5: The couple would luxest in the tranquility of the mountain cabin.

meanings.definition: superlative form of 'lux', referring to the highest level of luxury or opulence
meanings.sent1: The luxest of all yachts sailed into the harbor.
meanings.sent2: She dreamt of one day owning the luxest car on the market.
meanings.sent3: The king's crown was the luxest item in the entire kingdom.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, the luxest gift was the love of her family.
meanings.sent5: The luxest suite in the hotel had a private jacuzzi and a view of the ocean.
